00024                 protected function check_auth()
00025                 {
00026                         if (!Login::is_logged_in())
00027                         {
00028                                 $_SESSION['redirect_to'] = array('controller' => $this->name, 'action' => $this->action);
00029                                 $this->flash('Login is required to access the page you requested!', 'warning');
00030                                 $this->redirect_to(array('controller' => 'login'));
00031                         }
00032                 }

00039                 {
00040                         $visit = new Visit();
00041                         $visit->save();
00042                 }

00048                 protected function block_ip()
00049                 {
00050                         $blocked_ip_factory = new BlockedIp();
00051                         $blocked_ips = $blocked_ip_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`ip_addr` = '{$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']}'"));
00052                         if (count($blocked_ips) > 0)
00053                         {
00054                                 die(l('Sorry, your IP address is currently blacklisted'));
00055                         }
00056                 }

00062                 protected function add_acronyms()
00063                 {
00064                         $acronyms = array('URI' => 'Uniform Resource Identifier',
00065                                 'URL' => 'Uniform Resource Locator',
00066                                 'CSS' => 'Cascading Style Sheets',
00067                                 'JSP' => 'JavaServer Pages',
00068                                 'XML' => 'eXtensible Markup Language',
00069                                 'SMS' => 'Short Message System',
00070                                 'JSF' => 'JavaServer Faces',
00071                                 'HTTP' => 'HyperText Transfer Protocol',
00072                                 'GWT' => 'Google Web Toolkit');
00073                         $patterns = array();
00074                         $replacements = array();
00075                         foreach ($acronyms as $acronym => $explanation)
00076                         {
00077                                 $expl = h($explanation);
00078                                 $patterns[] = "/([^_\-a-z0-9])($acronym)([^_\-a-z0-9])/i";
00079                                 $replacements[] = "$1<acronym title=\"$expl\">$2</acronym>$3";
00080                         }
00081                         $this->response->body = preg_replace($patterns,
00082                                 $replacements,
00083                                 $this->response->body);
00084                 }
00085                 
00090                 protected function morse_encode()
00091                 {
00092                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00093                                 array(
00094                                         "/-->/",
00095                                         "/\/\*/",
00096                                         "/\*\//",
00097                                         "/>([^<]*)</e",
00098                                         "/(alt|title|content)=\"([^\"]*)\"/e",
00099                                         "/§§§/",
00100                                         "/###/",
00101                                         "/%%%/",
00102                                 ),
00103                                 array(
00104                                         "§§§",
00105                                         "###",
00106                                         "%%%",
00107                                         "'>'.Morse::encode('\\1').'<'",
00108                                         "'\\1=\"'.Morse::encode('\\2').'\"'",
00109                                         "-->",
00110                                         "/*",
00111                                         "*/",
00112                                 ), 
00113                                 $this->response->body);
00114                 }
00115 
00120                 protected function shrink_html()
00121                 {
00122                         return;
00123                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00124                                 array(
00125                                         "/\s+|\n/",
00126                                         "/>\s+</",
00127                                         "/> <(\/?)(p|link|meta|div|h|body|title|script|style|!--|ul|ol|li|dl|dd|dt|option|th|td|tr|table|tbody|thead|tfoot)/",
00128                                         "/<(p|link|meta|div|h|body|title|script|style|!--|ul|ol|li|dl|dd|dt|option|th|td|tr|table|tbody|thead|tfoot)([^>]*)> </",
00129                                 ),
00130                                 array(
00131                                         ' ',
00132                                         '> <',
00133                                         '><\1\2',
00134                                         '<\1\2><',
00135                                 ), 
00136                                 $this->response->body);
00137                 }

00145                 protected function sanskrit_ambra()
00146                 {
00147                         $this->response->body = preg_replace(
00148                                 array(
00149                                         "/&([^;]+);/",
00150                                         "/>([^<]*)</e",
00151                                         "/<&([^;]+);>/",
00152                                 ),
00153                                 array(
00154                                         "<&\\1;>",
00155                                         "'>'.Sanskrit::encode('\\1').'<'",
00156                                         "&\\1;",
00157                                 ), 
00158                                 $this->response->body);
00159                 }

00169                 protected function load_part_contents($filename)
00170                 {
00171                         $localized_filename = @preg_replace("/\.([^\.]+)$/",
00172                                 "-{$_COOKIE['hl']}.\\1",
00173                                 $filename);
00174                         if (file_exists($localized_filename))
00175                         {
00176                                 $contents = file_get_contents($localized_filename);
00177                         }
00178                         else
00179                         {
00180                                 if (!file_exists($filename))
00181                                 {
00182                                         HTTP::error(500);
00183                                 }
00184                                 $contents = file_get_contents($filename);
00185                         }
00186                         return $this->strip_external_php_tags($contents);
00187                 }
00188                 
00196                 protected function include_localized($filename)
00197                 {
00198                         $localized_filename = @preg_replace("/\.([^\.]+)$/",
00199                                 "-{$_COOKIE['hl']}.\\1",
00200                                 $filename);
00201                         if (file_exists($localized_filename))
00202                         {
00203                                 include($localized_filename);
00204                         }
00205                         else
00206                         {
00207                                 if (!file_exists($filename))
00208                                 {
00209                                         HTTP::error(500);
00210                                 }
00211                                 include($filename);
00212                         }
00213                 }
